seo.title: Targeted Advertising in Los Angeles | Broadsign Billboard & OOH Packages
seo.description: Advertise in Los Angeles with Broadsign's targeted billboard and OOH inventory packages. Reach your audience at prime locations, venues, and points of interest throughout LA. Maximize your advertising impact with Broadsign's strategic placements.

hero.title: Billboard and Out-of-Home Advertising in Los Angeles
blurb: Looking to advertise in Los Angeles? Unlock targeted advertising opportunities with Broadsign's curated billboard and OOH inventory packages. Reach your audience wherever they are with inventory strategically placed to target specific venue types, locations, and points of interest throughout Los Angeles.

opportunities.title: Unlock advertising opportunities in Los Angeles
opportunities.blurb: A national hub for entertainment, culture, tourism, sports, and more, advertisers and brands can reach target consumers across a variety of verticals throughout LA.

list.title: Demographics & Diversity
list.blurb: Los Angeles is home to one of the most diverse markets in the country, offering advertisers a prime opportunity to reach target audiences across vibrant cultures and communities.

features.text: Nearly 4M population in Los Angeles, 17M+ population in the DMA
50% of the population made up of women
Los Angeles County median household income of $83,000+

list.title: Transportation & Travel
list.blurb: From its sprawling highway network to its well-connected public transportation system, LA is an ideal market for advertisers to connect with diverse, on-the-go consumers.

features.text: 5 airports, including Los Angeles International Airport (LAX)
5+ major highways, including I-405, I-5, I-10 and I-110
Famous roads like Rodeo Drive, Sunset Boulevard, Melrose Avenue, and Hollywood Drive

topPackages.title: Explore digital OOH inventory packages for top audience segments in Los Angeles
topPackages.blurb: See our curated billboard and screen packages tailored for specific audiences around top advertising verticals in Los Angeles. Each package includes diverse environments, venue types, and demographics to boost brand visibility.
